name: Goblin
description: A small, mischievous creature that steals shiny objects.
plaggComment: Annoying little cheese thieves! They probably hoard cheese too.

name: Gray Wolf
description: A fierce predator with sharp fangs and keen senses.
plaggComment: Dangerous doggy! I bet they'd love some cheese treats.

name: Orc Warrior
description: A brutish fighter wielding a crude but effective weapon.
plaggComment: Big and smelly! Probably never tasted good cheese in their life.

name: Skeleton Mage
description: An undead spellcaster with powerful dark magic.
plaggComment: Spooky magic bones! Do skeletons even have taste buds for cheese?

name: Cave Troll
description: A massive, regenerating beast that lurks in caves.
plaggComment: Huge and ugly! They probably eat moldy cheese... if any cheese at all.

name: Young Dragon
description: A juvenile dragon with developing fire breath.
plaggComment: Baby dragon! I wonder if they breathe fire hot enough to melt cheese?

name: Ancient Lich
description: A powerful undead wizard with mastery over death magic.
plaggComment: Ancient and evil! Probably hasn't enjoyed cheese in centuries.

name: Treasure Mimic
description: A creature that disguises itself as a treasure chest.
plaggComment: Sneaky chest! I bet it's full of cheese... or at least I hope so.

name: Fire Elemental
description: A being of pure flame and heat.
plaggComment: Hot and fiery! Perfect for melting cheese fondue!

name: Corrupted Cheese Golem
description: A golem made of spoiled cheese - even Plagg finds this disturbing.
plaggComment: WHAT AN ABOMINATION! This is what happens when cheese goes bad! UNFORGIVABLE!
